name: codeanywhere-docs
description: This is the repo for the documentation for [Codeanywhere](https://codeanywhere.com/), a powerful online IDE.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run update-search-pool && npm run tsc && webpack && npm run copy-assets
scripts.dev:start: npx kill-port 3000 && npm run build && npm start
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src -e ts,ejs,css,md --exec npm run dev:start
scripts.update-search-pool: npm run tsc src/tools/updateSearchPool.ts && node src/tools/updateSearchPool.js
